entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
